korean: 주차할 곳을 찾느라 30분 넘게 빙빙 돌았다.
겨우 찾은 자리는 너무 좁아서 주차하기가 힘들었어.
옆 차랑 간격이 너무 좁아서 조심스럽게 문을 열었다.
차 끌고 나오는 건 정말 스트레스다.
english: I drove around for over 30 minutes looking for a parking spot.
The spot I finally found was so tight that parking was difficult.
The space between my car and the next one was so narrow that I opened the door carefully.
Bringing a car out is really stressful.
